verses.text: Save me, O God, by your name, and judge me by your might.
O God, hear my prayer; listen to the words of my mouth.
For strangers have risen up against me, and mighty men have sought my life: they have not set God before them. Pause.
For behold! God assists me; and the Lord is the helper of my soul.
He shall return evil to my enemies; utterly destroy them in your truth.
I will willingly sacrifice to you: I will give thanks to your name, O Lord; for \add it is\add* good.
For you have delivered me out of all affliction, and my eye has seen \add my desire\add* upon my enemies.
